item.title: Java Class文件结构
item.author: Vincent
item.description: 语言无关性 文件结构 u1 = 1byte 类型 名称 数量 u4 magic 1 u2 minor_version 1 u2 major_version 1 u2 constant_pool_count 1 cp_info constant_pool constant_pool_count-1 u2 access_flags 1 u2 this_class 1 u2 super_class 1 u2 interfaces_count 1 u2 interfaces interfaces_count u2 fields_count 1 field_info fields fields_count u2 methods_count 1 method_info methods methods_count u2 attribute_count 1 attribute_info attributes attributes_count magic u4 0xCAFEEBABE constant_pool_count
